BotPenguin vs collect-chat
Want a Collect.Chat alternative? BotPenguin enters the chat
BotPenguin starts with three things you won’t find remotely in Collect chat: All channel access, 60+ native integrations, and Live chat. Name a better Collect.Chat alternative. We’ll wait.
Detailed head-to-head
FREE Forever plan. No Credit Card Required.
What’s the difference between Collect.Chat and BotPenguin?
In short, a lot. But since you’re looking for a detailed answer
Pricing
Collect.Chat starts at $24/month, and BotPenguin starts at only $5/month.
No. of Chatbots
Both Collect.Chat and BotPenguin allow users to create unlimited chatbots. But BotPenguin gives 4x bot responses per month.
Channels
BotPenguin is for every channel. Collect.Chat is only available for websites.
Voice Support
BotPenguin provides voice support for bot uses, but Collect.Chat doesn’t.
So, who’s the best?
Do we even have to discuss it? From the conversation above, it’s be clear that BotPenguin is a superior Collect.Chat Alternative.

So, why do you need a Collect.Chat Alternative?
No live chat or AI: There’s no live chat or AI integration in Collect.Chat to handle complex situations or when the Chatbot fails (and, it will fail!).
Only website focused: Major drawback in Collect.Chat is the absence of other channels. You can’t use your chatbot on Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Slack, or anything.
No multilingual capability: Collect.Chat’s chatbot can’t converse in languages other than English. Say bonjour, and it’s gone!
Few bot responses: You get only 500 bot responses in their lite plan, 2500 in standard, & 5000 in plus. BotPenguin gives 2000 in the free plan.
No payment integration: Collect.Chat doesn’t have any payment integration. Means your chatbot can’t collect or process payments directly through chat.
No E-Commerce integration: You can use Collect.Chat on websites but not on e-commerce platforms. There’s no Shopify or wooCommerce integration available.
Try BotPenguin
Collect.Chat crumbles when BotPenguin makes an introduction
Use your chatbots on Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Micrsoft teams, Shopify, etc. We’re called omnichannel for a reason.
Integrate ChatGPT in your chatbot to make it generate human-like responses 24*7 with intent and sentiment detection.
60+ Native integration to your disposal. Integrate your chatbot to platform of your choice without any coding.
Put your marketing on autopilot with Drip Campaigns and Broadcasts.
Use Google Calendar integration to let your customers book appointments on the go.
Native live chat integration that allows your chatbot to do human handover when something crucial arises.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the pricing of Collect.Chat?
Collect.Chat's pricing starts at $24 per month. Please note that this cost is subject to change and you should check the Collect.Chat official website for the most recent pricing.
Does Collect.Chat support multiple platforms?
No, Collect.Chat is mainly tailored for websites and does not support integration with other platforms such as WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and Telegram.
Can you build a chatbot without coding in Collect.Chat?
Yes, Collect.Chat provides a no-code chatbot builder that allows anyone to create their custom chatbot.
Does Collect.Chat provide a multilingual chatbot?
Currently, Collect.Chat does not have the capability for their chatbot to handle languages other than English.
Can Collect.Chat chatbots be used on E-commerce platforms?
As of now, you cannot use Collect.Chat on E-commerce platforms as it does not provide integrations for Shopify or WooCommerce.
